name: Run (itch) (SANDAS2)
description: Legends says that there exists a large research factory in the world, and people in it are being transformed into various monsters. The player is one of the captured humans. One day, the player found that his handcuffs were loose and began his escape. In the process of the escaping, players will encounter transformed human bosses, other escaped humans, and experimenters who set themselves free. In the process of escaping, they will find the secret of the laboratory and the way to destroy it. the way to destroy it.
